item.description:
Kerry Skinner asked if I could schedule a meetup for "Brothers" on Saturday. Normally, I don't like to schedule meetups so close together ... but what the heck. Let's give it a whirl.

"Brothers" stars Tobey Maguire as a P.O.W. who returns home from Afghanistan. He finds his brother (Jake Gyllenhall) living with his wife (Natalie Portman), who thought she was a widow. For more information, here's the IMDB page: http://www.imdb.com/t...

This meetup is at Regal Cinema in Westboro. It's at the intersection of 135 and Route 9, behind Uno's Chicago Grill. The show starts at 3:55, so let's meet in the theater lobby at 3:30. If the time change affects your ability to attend, please update your RSVP.

group.name: The Worcester Movie Fans Meetup Group

item.name: Brothers - Meet at 3:30 in Westborough
